resources.string: There is no website available for this location.

A a soccer club with a long tradition. Beside professional teams for adults and minors, it has a soccer school for kids. Other sport activities also take place here. You can watch match every weekend.
Club for minors. Worth of mentioning that Wolbrom\'s judokas belong to best in voivodship
Great for hot days: outdoor and indoor pools, the fisrt one with jumping tower. The lesser with gym and sauna. Also swimming pool for little kids.
Tasty pizza being quite an opposition of Italian Pizza, with thick dough and definitely rich in meat toppings
Italian style pizza and American style burgers.
\"Traditional\" Polish kebab, available, of course, with spicy sauce. Burgers, pizza and toasted cheese sandwiches are also to be found in menu.
This founded in 2005 inn quickly became most prestigious restaurant in town, and now also includes small and comfortable hotel.
Situated in front of former hospital for the poor in 1638, this small church is most beloved monument of locals and small marvel of woodcraft.
Created in XIX century, Jewish Cemetery was devastated during World War 2. In 1988 was made a memorial to memory of Jews, who made significant part of town population before WW 2.

Statue of Jan Kiliński funded by Wolbrom Shoemaker Guild in 1924. A shoemaker by trade, born 1760, Jan Kiliński was colonel in Warsaw Insurrection. As a resident of Warsaw, born there, he is not related directly with Wolbrom.
Original MIG-17 Jet Fighter was given as a gift from Dęblin military unit to "Stomil" factory in 1980. Production started in 1950 in CCCP, MIG-17 was used in 40 countries all over the world.

Created in 1979 folk dance and song club shows value of tradition in over 500 performances in Poland and Europe. Participation in it is quite popular among Wolbrom kids and young people. Acts on the same scene where cinema is.
Annual celebration of town includes free concerts, fireworks, amusement park and toy bazaar open for everyone for 3 days. The last one took place at 22-24 June
A small cinema unique in that it also holds theater shows on the same scene.
